attributes.additional_details:
It is high time that England had a National Anthem for any event that it is appearing separately in, just as the Welsh and Scottish do, and we must begin campaigning to secure this for England.

Our National Anthem should be Land of Hope and Glory. We need an anthem that can unite all English men and women, unite a nation - singing for hope, glory, and England.

"Land of Hope and Glory, Mother of the Free,
How shall we extol thee, who are born of thee?
Wider still and wider shall thy bounds be set;
God, who made thee mighty, make thee mightier yet,
God, who made thee mighty, make thee mightier yet."
